name: Flourless Fudge Cookies
author: catmoore
summary: My gluten-free daughter was so happy with these!
ingredients: ⅔ cup dark cocoa powder (such as Hershey's® Special Dark)
2  egg whites, or more as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line 2 baking sheets with silicone mats or parchment paper
Mix confectioners' sugar, cocoa powder, and salt in a large bowl
Beat egg whites and vanilla extract into the sugar mixture until thick and batter-like; add chocolate chips and stir
Scoop batter by tablespoonful onto the prepared baking sheets
Bake in preheated oven until the tops are glossy and lightly cracked, 12 to 14 minutes
Let the cookies cool completely on the baking sheet and store in an airtight container for up to 3 days
